title: Cotton weaving a better future together

tasks.task: Participate in agricultural advocacy and support.
subtasks: Engage in discussing cotton's cultural significance.
Highlight the economic benefits of cotton to smallholders.
Mention the diverse uses of cotton beyond textile.
Promote the addition of value to cotton products.
Work towards reducing climate change effects in farming.
Research and consider launching a business related to Free Chinamaya IO.
Form a Red Team to develop the business plan.
** Engage in discussing cotton's cultural significance.
** Highlight the economic benefits of cotton to smallholders.
** Mention the diverse uses of cotton beyond textile.
** Promote the addition of value to cotton products.
** Work towards reducing climate change effects in farming.
** Research and consider launching a business related to Free Chinamaya IO.
** Form a Red Team to develop the business plan.
